Original: Ahh, nice to meet you. I am Dean...
a lonely monster hunter. Are you the
ones wanting to see a show?
[Page]
Tonight's opponent is... a large
crustacean! It's a rare sight, but
I know the trick to luring it out.
[Page]
But no matter how spectacularly I set
the stage, it's not worth performing
the act without a crowd.
[Page]
That's where you come in. You will
be the audience for a show written,
directed, and performed by me!
[Page]
[Color:5]Once the sun sets[Color:0], come to area [Color:5]B-3[Color:0] in
the Windy Plains and you'll see a show
to remember at the bottom of the hill!

Original: Do you not know what I mean by [Color:5]B-3[Color:0]?
It's the area indicated by B on the
left side of the map and 3 on top.

Come once the sun sets and... Oh!
